metadata.title: CVE-2021-3629 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Undertow. A potential security issue in flow controlhandling by the browser over http/2 may potentially cause overhead or adenial of service in the server. The highest threat from this vulnerabilityis availability. This flaw affects Undertow versions prior to 2.0.40.Finaland prior to 2.2.11.Final.

criterions.comment: undertow package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
